alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:20PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Uintah and southeastern Daggett Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 220 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 28 miles southeast of Manila, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Uintah and southeastern Daggett Counties. This includes Colorado 318 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
